name: angular-library-seed-demo
description: AOT/JIT/UMD build demo of angular library seed

scripts.build: npm run build:aot && npm run build:jit && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:aot: npm run build:aot:compile && npm run build:aot:bundle
scripts.clean:tmp: npm run clean:esm:aot && npm run clean:esm:jit && npm run clean:umd && rimraf esm/dist
scripts.clean:esm:tmp: rimraf esm/lib esm/node_modules esm/dist esm/src/app/*.ngfactory.ts esm/src/app/*.ngsummary.json
scripts.copy-lib-angular-govuk: cp -rf node_modules/govuk_frontend_toolkit angular/node_modules/ && cp -rf node_modules/govuk_template_mustache angular/node_modules/ && cp -rf node_modules/govuk-elements-sass angular/node_modules/
scripts.copy-lib-angular: mkdir -p angular/node_modules/@hmcts && cp -rf node_modules/@hmcts/ccd-case-ui-toolkit angular/node_modules/@hmcts && cp -rf "../dist" angular/node_modules/@hmcts/ccd-case-ui-toolkit/
scripts.prebuild:aot: npm run clean:esm:aot && npm run copy-lib
scripts.prebuild:jit: npm run clean:esm:jit && npm run copy-lib
scripts.prebuild:angular: npm run clean:angular && npm run copy-lib-angular && npm run copy-lib-angular-govuk
scripts.prestart: npm run clean:esm:jit && npm run copy-lib
scripts.start:angular: cd angular && ng build && ng serve
